ground_truth.thought: 获取观众对内容分发的接受度数据
ground_truth.name: LivePlatform.get_audience_acceptance_data

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'LivePlatform.get_content_distribution_strategy', 'description': 'Get the content distribution strategy of a live streaming platform.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'platform_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the live streaming platform'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'strategy', 'description': 'the content distribution strategy of the platform'}]}, {'name': 'LivePlatform.get_streamer_content_distribution', 'description': 'Get the content distribution methods used by a specific streamer.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'streamer_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the streamer'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'methods', 'description': 'the content distribution methods used by the streamer'}]}, {'name': 'LivePlatform.get_audience_acceptance_data', 'description': 'Get the audience acceptance data for content distribution methods.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'platform_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the live streaming platform'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'acceptance_data', 'description': 'the audience acceptance data for content distribution methods'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解直播经济中的内容分发。首先，请获取直播平台的内容分发策略。然后，获取主播如何进行内容分发。接着，获取观众对内容分发的接受度数据。最后，基于这些信息，为我提供一些关于如何进行内容分发的建议。
获取直播平台的内容分发策略
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'platform_name'的值是什么?
{'strategy': 'The platform uses a combination of algorithms and human curation to distribute content, focusing on trending topics and user engagement metrics.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'strategy': 'The platform uses a combination of algorithms and human curation to distribute content, focusing on trending topics and user engagement metrics.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

当前工具的参数'streamer_name'的值是什么?
{'methods': 'The streamer uses a mix of live streaming, pre-recorded content, and social media promotion to distribute content.'}
